component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
sortBy false java.lang.Object Property to be used when sorting this column either on client side or server side with ajax.
resizable false java.lang.Boolean false Boolean to make the column width resizable, default is false
filter false java.lang.Boolean false When set to true, places a data filter to the column header
selectionMode false java.lang.String
Type of the selection column; 'multiple' or 'single'. Multiple places checkboxes and Single places radio buttons inside this column.
parser false java.lang.String
Type of parser used to identify the type of data presented in the column.
width false java.lang.Integer java.lang.Integer.MIN_VALUE
Width of column in pixelsm.
